name: Ethena USDe
description: Ethena is a synthetic dollar protocol built on Ethereum

name: DeSyn Liquid Strategy
description: DeSyn is a decentralized liquidity infrastructure on Web3, empowering investors, projects, and security companies to invest, build, and manage collaboratively.

name: SolvBTC
description: SolvBTC is a universal Bitcoin reserve token that connects Bitcoin’s value across blockchains, backed 1:1 by a transparent, secure reserve. It empowers you to tap into DeFi and CeFi markets effortlessly, transforming idle Bitcoin into a dynamic asset for lending, trading, or yield generation—while keeping you in full control.

name: Stables Labs USDX
description: USDX is a synthetic USD stablecoin designed to provide stability without relying on traditional banking infrastructure. Backed by delta-neutral positions across multiple exchanges, USDX seamlessly bridges the gap between DeFi, CeFi, and TradFi. It enables DeFi users to access traditional delta-neutral strategies executed in CeFi platforms. As a crypto-native stablecoin, USDX offers a scalable, censorship-resistant, and highly stable solution for users looking to navigate the world of decentralized finance with confidence.

name: Superstate USTB
description: The Superstate Short Duration U.S. Government Securities Fund (USTB) is a private fund tokenized on the Ethereum blockchain (ERC-20), offered exclusively to Qualified Purchasers. USTB invests in short-duration U.S. Treasury Bills and U.S. Government Agency securities (“Government Securities”) and provides yield targeting returns in line with the federal funds rate.

name: BounceBit CeDeFi Yield
description: BounceBit CeDeFi combines CeFi and DeFi to generate yield on various assets across multiple chains. The yield is generated via delta-neutral basis trading on centralized exchanges, facilitated by CEX-integrated custody solutions like CEFFU. BounceBit CeDeFi uses the ERC-4626 Tokenized Vault Standard to enable daily rebasing of generated revenue

name: Resolv
description: Resolv is a protocol that maintains USR, a stablecoin fully backed by ETH and pegged to the US Dollar. The stablecoin’s delta-neutral design ensures price stability, and is backed by an innovative insurance pool (RLP) to provide additional security and overcollateralization.

name: BitFi Basis
description: Reliable returns with bfUSD, our yield-bearing stablecoin that fuels stability while amplifying your earnings in a dynamic ecosystem.

name: Aster asBNB
description: Aster's asBNB is a BNB liquid staking derivative that accrue rewards from Binance Launchpools, HODLer airdrops and Megadrops

name: SoSoValue Basis
description: The SoSoValue Indexes (SSI) Protocol is a cutting-edge spot index solution designed to make crypto investments simple and secure.

name: Manta CeDeFi
description: Manta CeDeFi: offering more opportunities for Manta users through a diversified approach to earning yield through CeFi and DeFi.

name: Avant avUSD
description: Avant is a DeFi platform established in June 2024 with the mission to create a more inclusive financial system through a DeFi-powered stable-value token. The platform introduces avUSD, a stable-value token, and savUSD, its staked, yield-bearing counterpart.

name: ZEROBASE CeDeFi
description: ZEROBASE introduces the first zk-powered staking product on stablecoins

name: Theo Network
description: Theo Network is a set of onchain contracts and off-chain systems built to capture onchain funding rates at scale

name: Aegis
description: Aegis performs funding rate arbitrage through delta-neutral trades in spot and perpetual markets, effectively generating profits from funding fees. These fees, disbursed three times daily, align perpetual contract and spot prices, ultimately rewarding YUSD holders.

name: Manta MYield
description: A coin-denominated real yield platform that combines RWA, CEX, and on-chain yields.
